title: Rebuild Namaz Öğretici men/women flows and illustrations (Turkey Hanafi) aligned to authoritative PDF

requirements.summary: Rebuild the complete Namaz Öğretici tutorial step content for men and women from scratch to match the authoritative PDF’s Turkey Hanafi flow (order, step set, and semantics).
acceptanceCriteria: The men tutorial flow steps (titles/descriptions/arabicText where applicable) are rebuilt to match the PDF’s Turkey Hanafi sequence (not just patched).
The women tutorial flow steps (titles/descriptions/arabicText where applicable) are rebuilt to match the PDF’s Turkey Hanafi sequence (not just patched).
Step order, step count, and step semantics match the PDF’s flow closely enough that the previously reported incorrect steps are no longer present.

file_operations.description: Rebuild both menNamazSteps and womenNamazSteps datasets based on the PDF (https://www.namazzamani.net/assets/pdf/namaz-nasil-kilinir-posteri.pdf) as the authoritative reference: rewrite step ordering and step text from scratch for Turkey Hanafi practice, ensuring the sequence and semantics closely match the PDF (not incremental edits).

requirements.summary: Replace the Namaz Öğretici illustration set with a new gender-specific image per step, stored as static generated assets, and remove reliance on any old tutorial image filenames.
acceptanceCriteria: All tutorial step illustrations are newly generated and stored under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Men and women flows do not reuse the same illustration files for the same step; each step has a gender-specific image.
All references in code point only to the new image filenames; removing any previously used tutorial images would not break the tutorial at runtime.

The “İftitah Tekbiri”, “Kıraat”, and “Rükû” step illustrations reflect the correct Turkey Hanafi posture as per the PDF (standing for iftitah; no Quran held during qira’ah; ruku with hands on knees), for both men and women.

requirements.summary: Update namazTutorialContent.ts to contain the rebuilt men/women step datasets with stable ids and valid imagePath values pointing to the new generated assets.
acceptanceCriteria: menNamazSteps and womenNamazSteps are updated to the rebuilt, PDF-aligned step lists.
Every step object includes: id, title, description, imagePath (and optional arabicText as needed).
All imagePath values resolve to files that exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Step ids remain stable and unique within each flow.

file_operations.description: Ensure each step object in menNamazSteps and womenNamazSteps includes id/title/description/imagePath (and arabicText where needed), with stable unique ids per flow and imagePath values that point to existing files under frontend/public/assets/generated (the namaz-tr-hanafi-*.dim_1024x1024.png assets).

requirements.summary: Harden and extend the Namaz Öğretici screen navigation so it remains correct with the rebuilt step lists (including changed step counts), supporting swipe + controls without out-of-range errors when switching flows.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can switch between men and women flows and always land on a valid step (no blank step, no console errors).
The step indicator (current step / total steps) reflects the new step counts.
Previous/Next buttons and dot navigation work across the entire rebuilt sequence for both flows.

file_operations.description: Update the tutorial screen to remain robust for changed step counts and flow switching: clamp current step on step-list changes, ensure dot/prev/next navigation always targets valid indices, and add swipe gesture navigation (touch/pointer) for stepping forward/backward without out-of-range errors.
